name: Car Pooling
title: Car Pooling
content:
There is a car with capacity empty seats. The vehicle only drives east (i.e., it cannot turn around and drive west).

You are given the integer capacity and an array trips where trips[i] = [numPassengersi, fromi, toi] indicates that the ith trip has numPassengersi passengers and the locations to pick them up and drop them off are fromi and toi respectively. The locations are given as the number of kilometers due east from the car's initial location.

Return true if it is possible to pick up and drop off all passengers for all the given trips, or false otherwise.

 

Example 1:

Input: trips = [[2,1,5],[3,3,7]], capacity = 4
Output: false

Example 2:

Input: trips = [[2,1,5],[3,3,7]], capacity = 5
Output: true

 

Constraints:

  • 1 <= trips.length <= 1000
  • trips[i].length == 3
  • 1 <= numPassengersi <= 100
  • 0 <= fromi < toi <= 1000
  • 1 <= capacity <= 105

discussion_posts.name: nishntraut17
discussion_posts.content: Hint: Not an Interval Problem, Its an Prefix sum problem

discussion_posts.name: rajat_171
discussion_posts.content:
I believe that the sample test cases should have the clear description.
Can anybody please explain the test cases???
I'm stuck at a test case where the total capacity of the passengers becomes greater than the given capacity so in that case our returned answer should be false. But the expected answer is True.

discussion_posts.name: Srinii99
discussion_posts.content: This problem is based on difference array concept

discussion_posts.name: soumakpoddar
discussion_posts.content: Don\'t think it as interval problem. Think how can we check the total passengers at a particular point.

discussion_posts.name: nikhilrajbhar
discussion_posts.content: If you\'re having hard time solving this problem, it\'s based on sweepline algorithm (not saying it can\'t be solved using another appoach). So, I would recomment you to learn learn sweepline algorithm.

discussion_posts.name: viveksharma14
discussion_posts.content: All you have to do is keep track of when peep get in and when they leave, make new array arr[1000] and in arr[sp]+=pass // pasengers will get in here and in arr[ep]-=pass //pass will get off , then add all and check if sum of arr is > limits then ret false else ret true
